characters: A child in a blue jacket on the right side of the image, a pedestrian in a yellow shirt on the left side of the image, a woman with a child on the left side of the image, and a cyclist on the right side of the image.
summary: The video sequence shows multiple instances of ghost probing behavior. In the first sequence, a child suddenly emerges from the right side of the image, darting into the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the second sequence, a woman with a child suddenly appears from the left side of the image, crossing the road from behind a parked vehicle. In the third sequence, a pedestrian in a yellow shirt suddenly emerges from the left side of the image, running into the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the fourth sequence, a cyclist suddenly appears from the right side of the image, entering the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle.
actions: The child, woman with child, pedestrian, and cyclist all exhibit sudden emergence from behind parked vehicles, creating immediate collision risks.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on both sides of the road, a child, a woman with a child, a pedestrian, and a cyclist.
